item.title: external-secrets
item.description:
Description

External secrets management for Kubernetes

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
external-secrets default ❌ — 42 1 Critical
external-secrets-cert-controller default ❌ — 8 1 Critical
bitwarden-sdk-server default ❌ — 0 1 —
external-secrets-webhook default ❌ — 0 1 —

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

🤖 external-secrets

Namespace: default  |  Automount: ❌

🔑 Permissions (42)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags
